column1: The RSGS has a small but important archive of material relating to past expeditions, voyages, and the work of famous explorers, together with records of the activities of the Society since its founding in 1884. These archives are being catalogued as part of the 'Images for All' project, and catalogues for these archives are available here.
Bona fide researchers may consult these items by arrangement with the RSGS Director (Dr David M Munro).
Latest revision on 4 th May 2005 by Kerr Jamieson (RSGS Map and Photograph Curator)
